name: x402
description: A payment protocol enabling AI agents to perform blockchain payments via HTTP 402 extensions.
purpose: Allow AI agents to autonomously pay for API access using stablecoins.
principle: Extends HTTP 402 with X-PAYMENT headers, defines a standard payment interaction model.
reusability: Open standard. SDKs available. Chain/token agnostic. Easy to implement on both sides.
limitations: Requires stablecoin support. Both client and server must adopt. Gas fees and latency exist.
